directions.step:
Date: Fri, 1 Mar 96 6:47:18 EST
submitted by: howle@ebicom.net Combine sugar, flour, spices and salt. Stir in apples. Let stand 30 minutes. Spoon into pastry shell; dot with margarine. Sprinkle topping over apples. Bake at 400 d. for 50-55 minutes. If it gets too brown, cover loosely with foil. Serve warm with ice cream.
Streusel topping: 1/2 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup margarine. Mix or process until crumbly.
Judy Howle, Columbus, Mississippi <howle@ebicom.net>
DAVE <DAVIDG@CLAM.RUTGERS.EDU>
